description: The Vodka Spritzer is an invigorating drink that is perfect for&nbsp;summer. You can make this alcoholic beverage in many different ways, but the most popular way consists of mixing vodka and&nbsp;club soda with some type of flavoring such as fruit juice or lemonade.The name "spritzer" comes from the German verb "spritzen," which means to splash or squirt. By consuming this drink, people can moderate their alcohol consumption without worrying about calories.
name: Vodka Spritzer
